Key Match Events: Wanindu Hasaranga claimed key wicket of Usman Ghani early and picked up scalps of Rashid Khan and Mujeeb Ur Rahman at the death
Mujeeb produced a moment of brilliance by clean bowling Pathum Nissanka for 10 early in Sri Lanka's reply
Pathum Nissanka was dismissed comically after attempting to sneak a second run and dropping his bat mid-pitch
Post-Match Reflections: Sri Lanka stays in contention for an unlikely semi-final berth
